text: Why is there a space in sys.argv[]?

code:
argc = len(sys.argv)

if (argc < 3 or argc > 5):
    printusage()
    sys.exit()

insensitive = 1 if ("-i" in sys.argv) else 0
boundaries = 1 if ("-b" in sys.argv) else 0

filename = sys.argv[argc-2]
str = sys.argv[argc-1]

print "Looking for '", str , "' in '" , filename , "'"

text: Why is there a space before and after 'goal' and 'football.txt' ?
When I try to print the str and filename variable by themselves, they don't have these spaces.
I've also tried using str.strip() in the print, but to no effect.
